control_name.label: Control
control_name.description: A required control name that identifies this field and its data. Must be unique for the current Form Area.

control_id.label: ID Attribute
control_id.description: An unique identifier for the field. Ignored when sync option enabled.

control_label.label: Label
control_label.description: An optional label for the field.

control_placeholder.label: Placeholder
control_placeholder.description: An optional text to be shown when the field has no value set.

control_attrs.label: Attributes
control_attrs.description: Define one or more attributes for the field. Separate attribute name and value by = character. One attribute per line.

control_min.label: Min
control_min.description: Inputted value must be greater than or equal to minimum.

control_max.label: Max
control_max.description: Inputted value must be lower than or equal to maximum.

control_mincount.label: Min Count
control_mincount.description: Inputted value count must be greater than or equal to minimum.

control_maxcount.label: Max Count
control_maxcount.description: Inputted value count must be lower than or equal to maximum.

control_minlength.label: Min Length
control_minlength.description: Inputted value length must be greater than or equal to minimum.

control_maxlength.label: Max Length
control_maxlength.description: Inputted value length must be lower than or equal to maximum.

control_mindate.label: Min
control_mindate.description: Inputted date must be greater than or equal to minimum.

control_maxdate.label: Max
control_maxdate.description: Inputted date must be lower than or equal to maximum.

control_mintime.label: Min
control_mintime.description: Inputted time must be greater than or equal to minimum.

control_maxtime.label: Max
control_maxtime.description: Inputted time must be lower than or equal to maximum.

control_minmonth.label: Min
control_minmonth.description: Inputted month must be greater than or equal to minimum.

control_maxmonth.label: Max
control_maxmonth.description: Inputted month must be lower than or equal to maximum.

control_minweek.label: Min
control_minweek.description: Inputted week must be greater than or equal to minimum.

control_maxweek.label: Max
control_maxweek.description: Inputted week must be lower than or equal to maximum.

control_step.label: Step
control_step.description: Value will be multiple of step.

control_pattern.label: Pattern
control_pattern.description: Inputted value must match the regular expression pattern.

control_error_message.label: Error Message
control_error_message.description: Override the server validation error message. Use {fieldlabel} as placeholder for the field label. Notice that HTML5 validation will ignore it and still use the browser default messages.

action_name.label: Name
action_name.description: A name to identify this action.

action_status.label: Status
action_status.description: Disable the action and publish it later.

action_conditions.label: Execution Condition
action_conditions.description: Compose a condition under which this action should be executed.
